goal.ch: 國內諸多組織均投入城鄉發展工作行列當中。這些措施具有若干共同點，例如推行乃藉助居民自主自發精神、尊重在地特殊性的考量下，採取由下而上運作途徑，有別於過往「大有為政府」由上而下施政模式。並企圖透過社區居民的溝通、協調以及合作，形塑在地認同和逐步塑造當地文化，從而激發當地活力及魅力。然而，以社區為尺度的建設發展措施即使容易貼近當地住民需求凝聚公民意識，不可否認的，在地社區意識是否能充分彰顯？再者，在地情感和需求與城鄉發展所欲解決問題焦點是否相同呢？或者各自有其發展邏輯呢？
goal.en: Many domestic organizations are actively involved in rural and urban development efforts. These initiatives share several common characteristics, such as promoting a spirit of self-initiative among residents and taking a bottom-up approach that respects local uniqueness. This is in contrast to the traditional "top-down" government-driven approach. They aim to shape local identity and gradually foster local culture by facilitating communication, coordination, and collaboration among community residents, thus stimulating local vitality and charm. However, it is important to consider whether the development measures at the community level, despite their ability to closely align with the needs of local residents and foster civic awareness, adequately emphasize a sense of local community identity. Furthermore, do the local sentiments and needs align with the focal points of urban and rural development, or do they each have their own distinct development logic?
